title: Textile (upholstery, U.S. Capitol), 1949
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: satin foundation with cut and uncut supplementary warp (velvet).
inscribed: Arrived with attached label,"U.S.Capitol. Senate gallery seats. Cut and uncut velvet. Note both 5 and 6 point stars are used in design. 5 point star is for the Senate; 6 point star is for the House. Same fabric in blue used for House Gallery seats.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a; weft selvedge to selvedge): 48 x 137 cm (18 7/8 x 53 15/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b; weft left selvedge): 38 x 34.5 cm (14 15/16 x 13 9/16 in.)
Repeat H x W: 10 x 11.5 cm (3 15/16 x 4 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Greek key grid with squares containing alternately 5 pointed and 6 pointed stars. A, 992754, is in red. B, 992755, is in blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile (upholstery, U.S. Capitol), 1949.
1949. Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: satin foundation with cut and uncut supplementary warp (velvet).. Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever. 1979-9-6-a,b.
